strings.Value: "What's going on here?"
"I would recognize that armor anywhere. What is a hellknight doing in my lands?"
"Why did you attack this knight?"
"Stranger, identify yourself!"
[Attack the peasants] "You broke the law by attacking this knight. The sentence is death!"
[Attack the hellknight] "Fellows, let's show this hellknight how we handle his filth in the Stolen Lands!"
"I have no wish to interfere. Deal with this yourself."
{n}One of the peasants, who is armed with a weapon, jumps up in alarm as you approach.{/n} "{mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}!"

{n}You look upon knight in pitch black armor, a monstrous snarling snout emblazoned on his breastplate. He doesn't turn to you — all his attention is taken by multiple adversaries. Nonetheless, you hear a muffled voice from under the visor.{/n} "Praise {g|Asmodeus}Asmodeus{/g}! {mf|Baron|Baroness|King|Queen} {name}, I presume? My regards. Please accept my apologies for not greeting you as the etiquette requires. I'm a little... busy."

{n}Another peasant takes a moment to quickly wipe the sweat from his forehead.{/n} "You're just in time! Look... Look who we've caught here! Look at the disgusting creature. He isn't afraid of anything!"
{n}You hear a chuckle from under the visor.{/n} "I intended to come directly to your court, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. Unfortunately, I was detained."
"These degenerates have never before set foot in the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}. — But there, this devil's spawn was walking right in the middle of the road. And we became so angry..."
"Right, we figured we could gang up on him... But you could help, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! We're shedding blood for your lands, after all!"
"This is a {g|Hellknights}hellknight{/g}! These wretches have dealings with devils!"

"Well... you know... they trample everyone whose lands they visit! Wherever there's one, there will soon be a hundred – in a blink of an eye! They crawl like locusts, with their executions and their laws!"

{n}The {g|Hellknights}hellknight{/g} laughs dryly.{/n} "Of course. Savages like these fear laws even more than fire or sword. Listen, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}, isn't it time to put this bandit trash in its place? You are too soft for such a savage land as this."

"Kayse Berro, maralictor of the {g|Order of the Nail}Order of the Nail{/g} of {g|Hellknights}hellknights{/g}." {n}The warrior pauses.{/n} "I hail from {g|Varisia}Varisia{/g}, if {mf|Your Grace| Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness} cares to know. I've come under direct orders of the paralictor, in order to hold negotiations."

{n}The {g|Hellknights}hellknight{/g} clenches his weapon.{/n} "Not the fairest trial, but it's acceptable. Please allow me to help, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. Weeding is our job."
"So... so you're just going to stand there and watch us die?!"
"Let's beat {mf|him|her} up for abandoning {mf|his|her} subjects when they're in trouble!"
"Yeah, right, keep listening to him! These scoundrels mean to conquer us. That's why they're nosing about! That's why!"

{n}The {g|Hellknights}hellknight{/g} seems to not hear his adversaries.{/n} "I ran into some unexpectedly aggressive local fauna. Luckily, I was prepared for such a turn of events. The {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g} are said to be full of surprises."
